text:
jyA iqya(gm) sama#nE pAqraya#ntI || 
tE Aqcara#ntIq sama#nEvaq yOShA# mAqtEva# puqtraM bi#BRutAmuqpasthE$ | 
apaq SatrUn# viddhyatA(gm) saM~MvidAqnE ArtnI# iqmE vi#ShPuqrantI# aqmitrAn# || 
baqhvIqnAM piqtA baqhura#sya puqtraSciqScA kRu#NOtiq sama#nA&vaqgatya# | 
iqShuqdhiH sa~gkAqH pRuta#nAScaq sarvA$H pRuqShThE nina#ddhO jayatiq prasU#taH || 
rathEq tiShTha#n nayati vAqjina#H puqrO yatra#yatra kAqmaya#tE suShAraqthiH | 
aqBISU#nAM mahiqmAna#M - [  ] 28
